text:
09 House Inspector General: 'Everybody' needs to fight in the current cyberwar 
Nextgov: Whether itâ€™s a nation state-sponsored hack or simply a teenager with a laptop, Congress comes under cyberattack on a daily basis, said House of Representatives Inspector General Theresa Grafenstine.
